morning.title: Day 1 – Breathe & Intend
morning.text: Sit tall. Breathe 4-2-4 ×4. Whisper one intention for today.
morning.action: Write one tiny win you’ll secure before noon.

morning.title: Day 2 – Gratitude 3
morning.text: Name 3 things: one body, one person, one opportunity.
morning.action: Send a thank‑you message to one person.

morning.title: Day 3 – Center & Verse
morning.text: Close eyes; hand on heart for 30 sec. Recall a calming verse/quote.
morning.action: Place that quote as your phone note.

morning.title: Day 4 – Focus One
morning.text: Choose ONE task that truly matters. Visualize finishing it.

morning.title: Day 5 – Kindness First
morning.text: Plan one kind act (call, smile, help).

morning.title: Day 6 – Body Wake
morning.action: Drink a full glass of water.

morning.title: Day 7 – Review & Reset
morning.text: Review the week: what lifted you most?
morning.action: Set one theme word for next week.

evening.title: Day 3 – Release
evening.text: Name one worry; release it for tonight.
evening.action: Park it for tomorrow with a first step.

evening.title: Day 4 – Kind Memory
evening.text: Replay a moment you were kind (or received kindness).
evening.action: Message a thank‑you or promise a repeat.

evening.title: Day 5 – Body Scan
evening.text: Scan from head to toe in 30 sec.

evening.title: Day 6 – Win Log
evening.action: Celebrate silently with one deep breath.

evening.title: Day 7 – Closing Prayer
evening.text: Offer the day: the good and the rough.

sos: Place a hand on heart. Inhale 4, hold 2, exhale 6 ×3.
Name 3 things you see, 2 you hear, 1 you feel.
Say: ‘This moment will pass. I am safe now.’
Drink water. Slow down your exhale.
Pick one next step you control in 60 sec.
